website_summaries.verdict: A soft, durable and affordable portable changing pad for newborns and infants.
pros: Diaper changing mat is wipeable and washable
Offers multiple pockets for organizing your items on the go
Ideal for short car rides, airplane travel, and everyday use
cons: Pad to support a baby's head is small

customer_reviews.title: Good as a back up
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay, it works for what I need it but doesn’t feel as heavy duty as the skip-hop version I have for my son, I got this for our new baby while my son stops using diapers and I can tell the difference in overall quality, feels thinner material but all works well, all the zippers and Velcro. Just not something I would gift but a great option if you are on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Must have for new baby!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have anything like this for my first and I wish I had. It makes changing the baby outside the home SO much easier. It folds up nicely, there's enough room for a change of clothes and the wipes, creams, and diapers. I changed my baby on floors, in the back of my car, public bathrooms, etc, all knowing this was protecting my baby from any gross surfaces. It wipes clean, it's super cute, and it's so much easier just grabbing this little pack out of the diaper bag instead of lugging the whole bag back and forth for a diaper change.
customer_reviews.author: Macaela Perez

customer_reviews.title: Good looking but it doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: When I received this item I was impressed with its thickness and colors. I ordered back in March and started using it at the end of April for my newborn. A month after, the inside material started breaking and ripping. As you can see in the pictures the hole is huge and I only use it couple of times a week. It was not expensive, but I expected to last at least few more months
customer_reviews.author: Darling Torres

customer_reviews.title: Not the best design and cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this changing pad for 9 months and it is already falling apart. The plastic material on the inside is breaking. Also it is not a very functional design. You can't really store bigger wipes in it, it's hard to open one handed (usually you will be holding a possibly screaming baby in the other hand), and it's pretty small. Also there's no padding so I always have to fold over the pocket side to give my baby a little cusion for her head. I'm buying another pad, and if I were you I think on this is would be worth spending a bit more for something that is better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. T

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this changing pad. It has packets to keep diapers and a pack of wipes inside. Folds up to fit in any diaper bag but also has a handle if you want to just carry it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Quality, ROOMY Bag
customer_reviews.text: Well made and spacious bag. Durable and we'll thought out in design. Recommend highly. Have been using daily for two months with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: kaykath

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Only tiny complaint I have is that it is bigger than one similar I had for my first baby. But it does the job and holds a few diapers and wipes!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: Has awesome pockets! Great if you're out and you change a diaper and you don't have a trash can. You can put wipes and a change of clothes + more if you don't want to carry a diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the price not very useful
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price at all not that great of a product and not that handy as it cleans poor quality waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: Jen Giesfeldt

customer_reviews.title: dont like it
customer_reviews.text: Dont like it, small and doesnt look like good quality
customer_reviews.author: gabriela quijada

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it did not last long. As of today, it is ripped and not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Will be great for on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Bachelder

customer_reviews.title: Quality isn't what it should be, sadly.
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a baby shower gift. I love, love the concept. I love that it clips instead of velcros closed, so velcro can't wear out. I love that it has generous pockets inside to holds diapers and wipes. It's easily used one handed. Unfortunately, after only about a dozen real uses, it is falling apart, and I'm super disappointed in the quality. Where the handle attaches, holes are appearing, and growing rapidly. We are super careful and gentle with things, so it's definitely a quality issue. I can't honestly say I'd recommend this particular clutch.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my baby registry and it was given to me as a gift. My baby in one month old and it is already starting to show wear. It has started to crack on the folds. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stitching is lacking
customer_reviews.text: Something like this is essential when out an about, but we were surprised that after only a few uses, the seam is coming apart!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my nieces baby shower. She and her husband loved it!
customer_reviews.author: RH

product_meta.title: Obecome Portable Waterproof Baby Diaper Changing Pad Kit, Travel Home Change Mat Organizer Bag for Toddlers Infants and Newborns
product_meta.description:
Color:Grey WhiteThe Obecome portable diaper pad is worth for all the toddlers infants and newborns owned.

It's very easy to use and easy to clean; the Diaper Changing clutch is perfect for short car rides, airplane travel and everyday use.
Premium Quality, Odour-free, Lightweight.
Folds easily and is compact to carry around or leave in the car or stroller.
A large and well cushioned, soft changing mat for your baby's soft skin.
Removable, allowing the body to become an independent diaper carry-all.
You can take pride in your new baby changing pad and feel completely at ease with offering it as a gift.
Any new mom would be thrilled to receive such a thoughtful and considerate gift for her baby shower!
Drop it in any bag, strap it to your wrist or clip it to your stroller and you're good to go anywhere!

Features:This is useful while your baby need to change their diper outdoor.Baby can comfortablely lay on this change mat to get changed with ease.

How to use:Open the mat,put on the even surface,lay the baby down on the white side of the mat which is water proof.You can split the mat using the zipper on the upper side of the mat.The storage pouch on the mat can store baby cloth,diper,wipes etc.This change mat can carry by hand or hang on the baby stroller easilly,best for a walk.


size： 
29*20*2cm.When it is fully opened, and the size is 92*29*54.5cm

Material: 
600D+Polyester Waterproof

Color: 
Grey and White
feature_bullets: Premium Quality: Made of BPA free non-toxic materials,very comfortable and skin-friendly for kids and adults.Protect your baby from the nasty germs in public facilities.
Easy Clean:Made of waterproof material.The diaper changing mat is wipeable & washable.
Large storage: Multiple pockets for organizing your items on the go. Large pocket spaces for both Moms’ necessaries and babies’ diapers, wipes and other baby changing supplies.

Easy Carry: The bag is collapsible, compact and travel-friendly.When it is closed,drop it in any bag, strap it to your wrist or clip it to your stroller,perfect for short car rides, airplane travel and everyday use.
Customer Satisfaction:your satisfaction is our priority,if you are not satisfied with our product, simply send it back to us and get a full refund.
